name: RectaGraphTrace

screenshots.caption: SVN revision 70 of RectaGraphTrace showing directed graph
SVN revision 73 of RectaGraphTrace running on OS X

short_description: RectaGraphTrace aims to assist in step-by-step visualization of graph search algorithms by displaying graphs and automating the creation and correction of graph traces such as those that a student would produce while manually executing a search.
